original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares jump in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares jumped in mid day trade on Friday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.67 percent or 75.44 points to 11,333.26, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 0.69 percent or 22.54 points to 3,296.30
Top gainers during mid day trade were, Hatton National Bank, Ceylon Tobacco Company & Hayleys Fabric. (Colombo/July28/2023)
